DataElement.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Bone Morphogenetic Protein Receptor Type-1A Signal Transduction Neoplastic Cell Assessment Cell Percentage Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The percentage value related to testing a sample for the laboratory assessment of ALK-3 tumor cell signal transduction.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Bone Morphogenetic Protein Receptor Type-1A Signal Transduction Neoplastic Cell Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to a laboratory procedure for the assessment of ALK3 (Bone Morphogenetic Protein Receptor Type-1A) signal (tumor) cells.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.

Concepts.definition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.

Property.preferredName: Bone Morphogenetic Protein Receptor Type-1A Signal Transduction Neoplastic Cell Assessment
Property.preferredDefinition: Bone morphogenetic protein receptor type-1A (532 aa, ~60 kDa) is encoded by the human BMPR1A gene. This protein is involved in ligand binding, signal transduction and embryonic development.:A cellular process that involves a chemical or mechanical stimulus and results in a specific cellular response. This process is a central feature of a broad variety of physiologic responses.:Cells of, or derived from, a tumor.:Having determined the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: Bone morphogenetic protein receptor type-1A (532 aa, ~60 kDa) is encoded by the human BMPR1A gene. This protein is involved in ligand binding, signal transduction and embryonic development.
A cellular process that involves a chemical or mechanical stimulus and results in a specific cellular response. This process is a central feature of a broad variety of physiologic responses.
Cells of, or derived from, a tumor.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: information related to the percentage value for a cell count.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Percentage; a fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: A fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/15/22 jk added "Qualified" RS as part of MCL quarterly content review.
